Title: Muteking the Dancing Hero
Description: ['Set in a city modeled after San Francisco in the 1980s, the protagonist has transformed into the hero Muteking and is fighting against evil aliens for some reason. Such a cheerful hero will return in 2020! Sci-fi hero love comedy ', Muteking the Dancing Hero, ', singing and dancing with pop music.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: Official Website)']
Voices: ['Eguchi, Takuya', 'Mashiro, Kentarou', 'Hino, Satoshi', 'Takahashi, Rie', 'Matsuyama, Takashi', 'Aoyama, Yutaka', 'KENN', 'Hatano, Wataru', 'Suzumura, Kenichi']
